column4: Any ideas about what would be causing screen problems like this: http://jverkamp.com/Screenshot.png ?  It started happening after upgrading to Ubuntu 8.10 with an nvidia graphics card.
are you using desktop effects? If so, does it do it without them?
I suggest trying the nv drivers. if that fixes we'll know if a different version of the nvidia drivers might help. Or, if you don't need 3D, you could just stick with them
I'd like 3D, but it's not strictly necessary.  I'll give it a try.
